ad_text: Augusta Health Recruitment Sponsored Are you ready to take the next step in your nursing career? Be a part of the Augusta Health’s new Nurse Externship Program today! Gain valuable on-the-job experience and training as you support a full complement of nursing services at Augusta Health. Under the supervision and direction of an experienced RN, you will deliver high-quality and patient-centered care for our community members. Clinical opportunities in OB, ER, OR, Medical, Surgical, Skilled Nursing, Rehab, ICU, and Progressive Care. RECRUITING.ULTIPRO.COM Summer Nurse Externship 2023 Summer Nurse Externship Program Apply now

Augusta Health Recruitment Sponsored Augusta Health is hiring RNs to work in our Main OR department as well as our outpatient Pavilion. If you have an interest in becoming part of an award-winning joint replacement program or a new and rapidly growing robotic surgery team, then this is the job for you!
